name: straw
text: A comment left by straw was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by twntysevn27, StoatLad, NeoNaoNeo, achilleselbow)

name: twntysevn27
text: I am not sure how alone on this I am...but sometimes I dig Pat. I never dig Asherdan. Ever.

name: mikeronomicon
text: You get a chubby for preaching the truth. Word.

name: hateandwar
text: You also have a delicious looking avatar

name: scorpio_nadir
text: That....what's wrong with working at Dairy Queen and preferring adult diapers? Astronauts do, you know.

name: andrew_
text: You just got lamed by the other person that everyone hates.

name: hipjiverobot
text: Has anyone noticed that there are a few people who always mark any comment by asherdan as lame or spam, no matter what it says?

name: fielding
text: Anyone has noticed this.

name: rowboat
text: Asherdan don't care about no internet people. Dude is raw .

name: mikeronomicon
text: A comment left by mikeronomicon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mercuri0us, UndyingSong, Satyr)

name: farqussus
text:
Explain how what you said is productive.

Now, I understand the mindset of being more critical if things you like, but you really write such snide, hateful things about this comic. If it is supposed to be constructive criticism, maybe write an email to Mr Onstad (NOT 'Stad), because I'm pretty sure he would not have been spending a lot of time on the assbar waiting for help from us.

I'd hate to be the object of your affection. I have a feeling you'd verbally rape my face off. Your interpersonal skills aren't very good are they. Do you have Asperger Syndrome? It is OK if you do.

name: holly_golightly
text: My sister has Asperger's, and the only time her interpersonal skills are nasty is when she has to encounter toolbags who assume being a nasty fuckwit correlates to Asperger's and not to the fact that some people are douchebags.

name: farqussus
text: While I sympathise, I am also in a position to know what behaviour Asperger's can bring about. Your generalisation is as bad as mine, toolbag.

name: holly_golightly
text: Yea, in retrospect I think my anger was more directed at the correlation between Asherdan's idiot commentary and anything personally related to me, which is not your fault. Your comment was amusing, it's just that he's such a freaking tool. I do apologize, humbly.

name: farqussus
text: aww man. now I feel bad. we're gold.

name: holly_golightly
text: Yay!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: you two get a room already.

name: fancyrat
text: Why do this? Why?

name: farqussus
text: do you mean why put a sausage dog on a turntable?

name: chaesar
text: A comment left by chaesar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jaredwilde, StoatLad, NeoNaoNeo, fattypneumonia, achilleselbow, Doc_Rostov, Satyr, AaronGStock)

name: chaesar
text:
He is like the person who goes against the grain just for the sake of going against the grain.

And as for the empty panels, of course no one says anything, Beef is letting Ray get out his thoughts on this Little Nephew situation.

name: catachresis
text: I was all for laming asherdan out of existence until I realised he had snapped out of it somewhat and people were still just all on his back even if he just said "Damn I like this strip"

name: caduceo
text: A comment left by caduceo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by featurelessvoid, fakead, NeoNaoNeo, shadowlink_97, achilleselbow, yaegmenthor, Darthemed)

name: rowboat
text: I'm not sure of the political dynamic, but catachresis has definitely been spammed more often than asherdan. There must be a reason for this.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Asher is so full of furious, impotent rage.

name: sweetlips
text: Seriously dude, the way you write is worse than like a plague.

name: evolume
text: Hey look! A comment where asherdan pretends he's not actually a fanboy.

name: epicurus
text: Does it have to be new? It is funny. Maybe he should also not have panels with drawings of characters in them anymore, because that is REALLY done to death these days.

name: rowboat
text:
Hey look! A cat wearing designer glasses and a thong.

That's new!

name: slalvation
text:
Hey look! Talking animals!

That's new!

name: mr_lostman28
text:
Hey look! Raging hard cat cock!

Like that hasn't been done before.

name: s1rnight
text:
OH NO A COMEDIC DEVICE IS BEING USED

PHONE THE POLICE

name: jhunter
text: man you crazy, Sting ain't interested in comedic devices at all

name: lolsworth
text: This 2004 run of strips where Asherdan being a giant cock is the first comment needs to be linked to every time someone expresses confusion over why we all hate Asherdan

name: never_die
text: Lil Nephew must be a genius if he knows what actors his uncle incorrectly thinks are in movies.

name: neccos
text: There used to be a link to some sort of fake classifieds when you clicked on this strip.  Does anyone know anything about this?

name: ttagxamm
text: The link is still active from the main page version of the strip, it's to a mock-personals page of the Framley Examiner , apparently a British parody newspaper. Can UK readers elaborate?

name: dueledge
text: some of those fake personals are awesomely funny

name: satyr
text:
Oh, thank you for that link!

Must come up for air ... can't stop laughing.

name: ezcmac
text: I always thought the guy in Twister was Dennis Quaid, and that the lady is the one from Jurassic Park.

name: rowboat
text: It was the dude from Aliens and the chick from INLAND EMPIRE.

name: farqussus
text: ezcmac, you are basically not wrong.

name: slalvation
text: Ouch, man. The embarrassment is tangible. It is like a knife to the gut.

name: misterh
text:
I love when Ray has his moments of thought. In panel 7, I imagine him sighing to himself before speaking in panel 8.

Just like in the strip featuring "Asleep Style".

"Who knows man"

name: wilbur
text: One of those rare occasions where I think the alt text is funnier than the strip itself. Not that the strip ain't hilarious, mind you.
